pages.text: You immediately took a liking to the rotating roundels in those ancient structures, so much so that you copied their design yourself. Definitely a nice way to present your items, or keep them ready.$(br2)$(italic)Hopefully the patents have already expired.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The basalt and calcite varieties you cobbled together hold significantly more items, up to 6 whole stacks.
